impact-statement: Building on previous work (Froelich et al., 2014), we present the X-ray crystal structure of an active MCM hexamer, which suggests a mechanism for MCM regulation and demonstrates a key interaction between the major domains.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
